participant_1.background:
I wake up late in the morning, and enjoy a leisurely breakfast with my family.
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
i still live with my parents.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

participant_2.background:
I love playing fetch with my dogs, but it can be a little time consuming.
i own a pug , and he is the most loyal pet you will ever have.
my favorite show is csi.
i live with my boyfriend of 5 years.
i have a collection of video games.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite show?
CSI, it's so good! What about yours?
I like medical dramas and comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
I love medical dramas too! I'm not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.
That's cool! I still live with my parents, but I'm trying to get out soon.
I live with my boyfriend of 5 years, and we have a pug who is the most loyal pet you will ever have.
I love dogs, but I don't have any right now. I do have a collection of video games though.
That's awesome! I love playing fetch with my dogs, but it can be a little time consuming.
I love playing fetch too! It's a great way to get some exercise and have some fun with your dog.
I'm glad we have so much in common! I think we'd be great friends.
I think so too! We should get together sometime and play fetch with our dogs.
That sounds like a great idea! I'll bring my pug, and you can bring your favorite video game.
